name: NanoDev Node.js Container
description: Development container based on official Node.js 24 image optimized for React Native/Expo and Next.js. Includes TypeScript, pnpm, yarn, Expo CLI, EAS CLI, Vercel CLI, Python (uv for MCP), and essential dev tools. Designed for cross-platform development with proper path mapping for macOS/Linux hosts.

userName.description: Container username (uses official Node.js image's default 'node' user)
